name: Oneirogen
description: Oneirogen is a dreamlike circular journey through the depths of the developer's subconscious. Take a break from reality and dive into this surreal world that is perfect for an inspiring jaunt.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: CPU Intel i7 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 980/1060 or AMD Fury (equivalent or greater) Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: CPU Intel i7 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 980/1060 or AMD Fury (equivalent or greater) Storage: 3 GB available space
